body.p:
Catlettsburg Ky
July 27th 1864
To His Excellency
Thos. E. Bramlett Govenor of Kentucky
Dear Sir

In the enclose you will find a copy of the order of the Boyd Circuit Court at its May term, 1864, assessing a fine of sixty dollars agst Doctor Wm Pugh of this place. In the absents of my partner Col L.T. Moore whom you know personally, I now adress you asking you to remit the fine agst Doctor Wm Pugh. who is a worthy man of Small means, not only worthy but a useful one in this Community If you can with Justice & honor remit that portion ^of^ the fine which goes the state I will be under many obligation to you I hope at no far distant period to become acquainted with you personally myself

I remain your Humble servant
J. D. Jones

Boyd Cir Ct
